Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie is divided into two parts: the beginning of Miyazawa’s life at the beginning of the Showa period and the ending at the beginning of World War II. It is a story of a man who strongly held discordant views against society, with a good humoured side to him.
